post:
After many months of detailed planning, testing and tweaking we are delighted to finally open our doors to the general public. It has certainly been a long journey, but we have no doubt that it has been a worthwhile one.
We are immensely excited about our brand new VPS plans. New brand, same people.

Please check out our FAQ page if you have any questions and please sign-up on our generous vps affiliate program IT'S FREE!
Check out our unmanaged vps plans and our vps specials

Custom built OS templates to fit not only your web hosting needs, make your VPS a pbx server, remote desktop workstation or a dedicated VPN server.
Stripped down, and fully optimized for speed centos OS template available on all plans with nginx pre-installed along with custom build scripts for your high traffic sites.

# Available upgrades

Extra IP(s): $1.5/mo per IP
Additional RAM: 128MB - $5/mo, 256MB - $10/mo, 512MB - $15/mo, 1024MB $30/mo
Additional Disk Space: 5GB - $5/mo, 10GB - $8/mo, 30GB - $25/mo, 50GB - $40/mo
Additional Bandwidth: 20GB - $3/mo, 50GB - $6/mo, 100GB - $10/mo, 250GB - $22/mo
Additional Extras: Webmin - free, Lxadmin/Kloxo 40 domains license - free, cPanel/WHM - $12/mo, DirectAdmin - $11/mo

# Hardware nodes specification

CPU: Core2quad 9400/9550
RAM: Fully buffered DDR2 800MHZ 8 - 16GB
Disks: Hitachi HDT72101 2 x 1TB in hardware RAID1 100MB/s (real, tested with hdparm)
Network: Dedicated 100mbp/s full-duplex port
OS: Centos 5 64bit openvz kernel, VPS panel linked to customer's WHMCS area
Capped at 15 VPS servers per node.
All hardware is owned and still under warranty.
